com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.connection

Class ConnectionSettingsStoresFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.connection.ConnectionSettingsStoresFactory

  • public class ConnectionSettingsStoresFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating ConnectionSettingsStores. It provides different kinds of stores storing the ConnectionSettings at different places.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ConnectionSettingsStoresFactory(RawStoresFactory rawStoresFactory, AcrolinxFactory acrolinxFactory) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionSettingsStore createApplicationConnectionSettingsStore(ApplicationStore applicationStore)
      Creates a ConnectionSettingsStore using a ApplicationStore as back end.
      ConnectionSettingsStore createFileConnectionSettingsStore(File storeFile)
      Creates a new file-based connection settings store.
      ConnectionSettingsStore createPropertiesConnectionSettingsStore(PropertiesStore propertiesStore)
      Creates a ConnectionSettingsStore using a PropertiesStore as back end.

    • Method Detail

      • createApplicationConnectionSettingsStore

        public ConnectionSettingsStore createApplicationConnectionSettingsStore(ApplicationStore applicationStore)
        Creates a ConnectionSettingsStore using a ApplicationStore as back end. See: ApplicationStore
        Parameters:
        applicationStore - The ApplicationStore to be used.
        Note: You also could use the same as for the AcrolinxClient using AcrolinxClient.getStore().
        Returns:
        A new instance of ConnectionSettingsStore storing to ApplicationStore .

      • createFileConnectionSettingsStore

        public ConnectionSettingsStore createFileConnectionSettingsStore(File storeFile)
        Creates a new file-based connection settings store.
        Parameters:
        storeFile - the file where the connection settings are stored
        Returns:
        the connection settings store

      • createPropertiesConnectionSettingsStore

        public ConnectionSettingsStore createPropertiesConnectionSettingsStore(PropertiesStore propertiesStore)
        Creates a ConnectionSettingsStore using a PropertiesStore as back end. See: PropertiesStore also see: ApplicationStore
        Parameters:
        propertiesStore - the properties store
        Returns:
        the connection settings store
